name: Mountain Dwarf Soldier

actions.name: Handaxe
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft.  one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage  or 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage if within 5 feet of an ally that is not incapacitated.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit  range 100/400 ft.  one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

document__title: Level Up Advanced 5e Monstrous Menagerie OGL
